exclusion.criterion: inability to perform the 6MWT according to ATS criteria
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: cognitive impairment by mini mental state examination (MEEN)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: abandonment of treatment during the application of the protocol
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: uncontrolled hypertension (> 180/100 mmHg with medication use)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a known case of Acromegaly who underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He has clinical stability and is eligible for the treatment protocol.
